text: avan (allāhu) paṟayuṁ: jinnukaḷil ninnuṁ manuṣyaril ninnumāyi niṅṅaḷkku mump kaḻiññupēāyiṭṭuḷḷa samūhaṅṅaḷuṭe kūṭṭattil narakattil pravēśiccukeāḷḷuka. ōrēā samūhavuṁ (atil) pravēśikkumpēāḻeākke atinṟe sahēādara samūhatte śapikkuṁ. aṅṅane avarellāvaruṁ aviṭe orumiccukūṭikkaḻiññāl avarile pingāmikaḷ avaruṭe mungāmikaḷeppaṟṟi paṟayuṁ: ñaṅṅaḷuṭe rakṣitāvē, ivarāṇ ñaṅṅaḷe vaḻiteṟṟiccat‌. at keāṇṭ avarkk nī narakattil ninn iraṭṭi śikṣa keāṭukkēṇamē. avan paṟayuṁ: ellāvarkkuṁ iraṭṭiyuṇṭ‌. pakṣe niṅṅaḷ manas'silākkunnilla
